p: The raw materials of G. mangostana were obtained from Penang, Malaysia. The plant materials were obtained from a single tree of about 5 years old and 3m height. The green mature leaves, bark, stem and whole ripe purplish fruit were collected for this study. A voucher specimen (No. 11247) has been deposited at the herbarium, School of Biological Sciences, Universiti Sains Malaysia, Malaysia. The plant materials were separated into the following parts: leaves, bark, stem and whole fruit (the whole fruit was further separated into pericarp, aril, calyx, and stalk).
